description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. no. PP/2014/4595, dated 28.11.2014 for Demolition of existing garages and the construction of two three-storey apartment buildings containing 18 residential units (2 x 1-bedroom units and 16 x 2-bedroom units) and a part-two, part-three storey pair of semi-detached houses (2 x 4-bedroom units), the siting of three detached refuse stores within the landscaped courtyards of the neighbouring apartment buildings (at 1-28 Swan Road; 1-11 Whittle Close; 4-38 Wallis Road and 40-74 Wallis Road), associated landscaping and the re-arrangement of the adopted highway and on-street parking spaces in Lovell Road, Whittle Close and Swan Road (Deemed Consent) Wording of condition 7 to be amended to read as to identify and provide electric car charging points for 20% of the new car parking spaces (4 no) to be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to first occupation of the development.
decision_conditions: Condition 7 of planning permission PP/2014/4595 dated 14/04/2015 shall be complied with in the varied form; To identify and provide electric car charging points for 20% of the new car parking spaces (4 no) to be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to first occupation of the development.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
